natural problem:
Is $f(x) = 3^{x^2-3} - |x|$ an even function, odd function, or neither?

Enter "odd", "even", or "neither".

a_0.formal problem:
theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = 3 powr (x powr 2 - 3) - abs x"
shows  "even f"
a_0.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Is $f(x) = 3^{x^2-3} - |x|$ an even function, odd function, or neither?

Enter "odd", "even", or "neither". The final Answer is \text{even}
 ### Proof
 $$f(-x) = 3^{(-x)^2-3} - |-x| = 3^{x^2-3} - |x| = f(x) $$which means $f$ is $\boxed{\text{even}}$.
 *)

theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = 3 powr (x powr 2 - 3) - abs x"
shows  "even f"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_0.informal problem: Determine whether the function $f(x) = 3^{x^2 - 3} - |x|$ is an even function.

a_1.formal problem:
theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = 3 powr (x powr 2 - 3) - abs x"
shows  "\<forall> x. f x = f (-x)"
a_1.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Is $f(x) = 3^{x^2-3} - |x|$ an even function, odd function, or neither?

Enter "odd", "even", or "neither". The final Answer is \text{even}
 ### Proof
 $$f(-x) = 3^{(-x)^2-3} - |-x| = 3^{x^2-3} - |x| = f(x) $$which means $f$ is $\boxed{\text{even}}$.
 *)

theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = 3 powr (x powr 2 - 3) - abs x"
shows  "\<forall> x. f x = f (-x)"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_1.informal problem: Does the function $f(x) = 3^{x^2 - 3} - |x|$ satisfy the property $f(x) = f(-x)$ for all real values of $x$?

a_9.formal problem:
theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = (3 powr (x powr 2 - 3)) - abs x"
and h1 : "\<forall> x. f x = f (-x)"
shows  "is_even_function f"
a_9.formal solution:
(* ### Problem
 Is $f(x) = 3^{x^2-3} - |x|$ an even function, odd function, or neither?

Enter "odd", "even", or "neither". The final Answer is \text{even}
 ### Proof
 $$f(-x) = 3^{(-x)^2-3} - |-x| = 3^{x^2-3} - |x| = f(x) $$which means $f$ is $\boxed{\text{even}}$.
 *)

theorem
fixes f :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. f x = (3 powr (x powr 2 - 3)) - abs x"
and h1 : "\<forall> x. f x = f (-x)"
shows  "is_even_function f"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
a_9.informal problem: The function $f(x) = 3^{x^2 - 3} - |x|$ is defined for all real numbers. If $f(x) = f(-x)$ for all $x$, then $f$ is an even function.
